name: BHOOMIKA VIHAR FOUNDATION
briefDescription: The Acronym or Short Name of Bhoomika Vihar Foundation is BVF India. BVF India is a new generation organization which provides training, technological assistance and information elated to trade, commerce and business for promoting employment opportunities. It also  promote sustainable livelihood for people in poverty and also provide opportunity to render financial assistance in any form to the socially, economically & politically backwards people (women in particular) in order to empower them to generate income for their livelihoods and self sustainability. At BVF India we believe that “Poor people know how to manage their life style only thing they require are technical skills, capacity building, capital and right to market place”.Bhoom
